title.en: Invocation for the Flourishing of the Sakya Teachings1

text.en: Root and lineage gurus, hosts of yidam deities,
text.en-trans: tsa gyü lama yidam lhatsok dang

text.en: And especially Kurukullā, lady of magnetizing,

text.en-trans: tsok kyi dakpo döpé gyalpo dang

text.en: Swift-acting White Mahākāla, the Wish-Fulfilling Jewel and the rest,
text.en-trans: nyur dzé gön kar yizhin norbu sok

text.en: Magnetizing and enriching deities, I invoke your wisdom minds,
text.en-trans: wang gyé lha nam tukdam gyü kul na

text.en: So that the Buddhist teachings in general and precious Sakya teachings in particular
May spread throughout the ten directions,
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen chok chur pelwé lé

text.en: As we establish great centres of teaching and practice,
text.en-trans: shé dang drubpé dé chen dzukpa la

text.en: Attract Dharma-observing kings and ministers, wealthy householders and the like.
text.en-trans: chöden gyal lön jorden khyimdak sok

text.en: Let our resources be not scarce but abundant,
text.en-trans: wang du dü shing longchö pong mepa

text.en: Accumulating as naturally as southern clouds.
text.en-trans: lho trin zhindu ngang gi duwar dzö

text.en: And let the activities of renunciation and study thrive.
text.en-trans: pang dang lokpé jawa pelgyé shok

text.en: Grant your blessings so that the machinations of obstacle-making spirits
text.en-trans: dé la barchö tsompé jungpo dang

text.en: And asura-like barbarians may be thoroughly pacified,
The status of the Three Jewels rise ever higher,
text.en-trans: könchok sum gyi upang rab to zhing

text.en: And happiness and well-being increase among the teachings and beings.
text.en-trans: ten dror dekyi pelwar jingyi lob
